items.value: Capone waits for a special delivery!

Oh hello...
I am currently waiting for a special delivery!
Ivan on the Seaside promised to send someone.
who is Ivan? Tell me more...
yes i have the delivery! (+2x free Inv. Slot)

Ivan is a pure Businessman!
Not a bad guy like me ...

But he promised to deliver something we need.
You can find Ivan Seaside!
Err.. i will come back later!

I was really waiting for that, the Gang will be happy!
Thank you, you seem to have your Nose in everything.
Here take this Suitcase and bring it to Ivan!

You get:
1x Gang Delivery
2x Baggie (Ecstasy)

Unfortunately you don't have what I need with you!
Come back when you have the delivery.
